post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
POSITION TITLE:  Intermediate Software Developer
LOCATION:  Downtown Toronto
DURATION:  6 Month Contract
RATE:   $40 - $45 / hr POSITION OVERVIEW: This position is aimed at an intermediate level developer who will be able to work independently and in a team to efficiently achieve the functionality desired in a short period of time.  The successful applicant will have experience working with database driven web applications using popular open source frameworks and libraries. QUALIFICATIONS: * Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, and/or equivalent experience
* 3+ years developing Java based applications in a professional setting
* Experience with JSF, JSP, JavaScript, CSS.
* Experience developing J2EE based web applications
* Experience with Struts 1.x, Spring 1.x/2.0, Hibernate, JPA, JTA
* Experience with XML and related technologies in a JAVA environment
* Experience with MySQL and writing optimized SQL.
* Experience with testing frameworks and methodologies
* Ability to develop in a Linux based environment
* Comfortable working in a fast passed, agile, team based work environment
* Interpersonal and communication skills (oral and written), presentation skills, analytical and problem-solving abilities are an absolute must. You can view a full description of this position J2EE Developer (XML, Hibernate, Spring) - ID# 1011454 at our online career centre http://www.aresstaffing.com/hotjobs.html  To apply to this position please apply through our web portal or forward your resume directly to this job's email at 1011454.ares@hiredesk.net Regards,  


AReS Staffing Corporation
1835 Yonge Street, Suite 603
Toronto, Ontario
M4S 1X8
416.480.2700
Fax 416.480.2886
www.aresstaffing.com
post.title: J2EE Developer (XML, Hibernate) - CONTRACT, Toronto
